recipe.title: Pomegranate and Queso Fresco Salsa
ingredients: 2 tablespoons crumbled queso fresco or feta
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: 1 Toast the pine nuts in a dry skillet over medium heat until golden, 4 minutes. Transfer to a plate to cool.
2 In a small bowl, mix the pomegranate seeds, basil, queso fresco, and cooled pine nuts. Drizzle with the olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
